sentences.en: A porous pellet was fabricated by the well - known wash - out process.
sentences.cn: 用熟知的浸洗办法制出带孔的药丸.

sentences.en: Experiments with the porous plate exhibIt'somewhat less scatter in the results.
sentences.cn: 用多孔板所得的实验结果则显得散布程度小些.

sentences.en: He added sand to the soil to make it more porous.
sentences.cn: 他往土里掺沙子以提高渗水性能.

sentences.en: Hygrometers based on porous materials are neither accurate nor quick response.
sentences.cn: 以多孔材料作成的湿度计既不准确,响应又慢.

sentences.en: Most soils and rocks are porous.
sentences.cn: 大部分土壤和岩石都是多孔的.

sentences.en: Mr Balaguer is deploying more soldiers along his country's porous border with Haiti.
sentences.cn: 巴拉格尔先生正向本国和海地之间驻守不严的边界部署更多的士兵。

sentences.en: Once a tough defensive team, the Saints now have the most porous defence in the league.
sentences.cn: 圣徒队一度防御能力很强，现在却成了联盟里防守漏洞最多的队伍。

sentences.en: Suetion devices are inadequate in gravels or very porous soils.
sentences.cn: 吸水装置对砂砾或非常疏松的土壤是不适用的.

sentences.en: Swimming is helpful for bones that are porous and weak.
sentences.cn: 游泳有助于改善骨质疏松和骨骼脆弱。

sentences.en: The local limestone is very porous.
sentences.cn: 当地石灰岩渗透性很强。

sentences.en: The shell has to be slightly porous to enable oxygen to pass in.
sentences.cn: 外壳不得不有些细小的孔以便能使氧气通过.

sentences.en: The water slowly drained away, down through the porous soil.
sentences.cn: 水慢慢流走了，渗入了疏松的土壤。

sentences.en: These constitute the upstream and downstream faces of the porous domain.
sentences.cn: 这些是由多孔区的上游面和下游面组成.

sentences.en: This quantity describes the retention of particles in a porous substance.
sentences.cn: 这个参数描述阻留在多孔体中的微粒量.

words.tran_cn: 多孔渗水的；能渗透的；[生物]有气孔的

phrases.tran_cn: 多孔材料；多孔性材料；疏松材料

trans.tran_cn: 能穿透的，能渗透的，有毛孔或气孔的，漏洞多的，易穿过的
trans.tran_en: allowing liquid, air etc to pass slowly through many very small holes
